quote: So Jehovah God caused the man to fall into a deep sleep, and while he was sleeping, he took one of his ribs and then closed up the flesh over its place.
After that Moses consented to stay with the man, and he gave his daughter Zip路po使rah to Moses in marriage.
After eight days, when it was time to circumcise him, he was named Jesus, the name given by the angel before he was conceived.
